synopsis.text: When Professor Agasa goes missing, Conan and the Detective Boys are launched into a perilous search to find their friend. Clues left behind at Agasa's house indicate his disappearance is part of an elaborate game, but as the stakes heighten, the children realize the Professor has actually been kidnapped. With Agasa's life on the line, Conan races to decipher cryptic clues scattered across the city before time runs out. Solving the challenging riddles requires keen observation, deductive reasoning, and teamwork. But most of all, it will test the wits and determination of these pint-sized detectives to crack the case and rescue their mentor from mortal danger.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
